aboutUsOverview.title: Artemis: Interactive Learning with Individual Feedback

detail.programmingExercises: Programming exercises with version control and automatic assessment with test cases and continuous integration
detail.quiz: Quiz exercises with multiple choice, drag and drop and short answer quiz questions
detail.modelingExercises: Modeling exercises with semi-automatic assessment using machine learning concepts
detail.textExercises: Textual exercises with manual (and experimental semi-automatic) assessment
detail.uploadExercises: File upload exercises with manual assessment

exam.title: Artemis supports the following features for exams

detail.supportedExerciseTypes: All exercises from above are also available for exams
detail.randomSelectionOfVariants: Multiple variants per exercise can be created and randomly selected for every student
